valhelsia.chat.first_start_message: Welcome to Valhelsia 5! The modpack is currently in beta, is not yet complete and bugs may be present.
valhelsia.chat.discord: Join us on our Discord server.
valhelsia.tooltip.how_get_jade: This gemstone can be found in the Jungle biomes.
valhelsia.tooltip.backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 1 upgrade slot.
valhelsia.tooltip.iron_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 2 upgrade slots.
valhelsia.tooltip.gold_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 3 upgrade slots.
valhelsia.tooltip.diamond_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 5 upgrade slots.
valhelsia.tooltip.netherite_backpack: Contains 27 inventory slots and 7 upgrade slots.
valhelsia.tip.abacus: Need to measure the distance between two blocks? Craft an Abacus to help!
valhelsia.tip.jade: Looking for Jade? Search underground in Jungle biomes.
valhelsia.tip.carryon: You can pick up many mobs and blocks by sneaking and right-clicking with both hands empty.
valhelsia.tip.magical_farmland: Farmland can be upgraded to Magical Farmland by using Arcane Bone Meal on it.
valhelsia.tip.trowel: The Trowel will place a random block from your hotbar when used, making it great for building with block variations!
valhelsia.tip.snail: You can find snails in autumnal biomes, and they love all things mushroom!
valhelsia.tip.cockroach: Did you know that cockroaches enjoy percussion and fancy hats?
valhelsia.tip.natures_compass: Searching for a specific biome? Craft a Nature's Compass to find it!
valhelsia.tip.cardboard_box: Want to move things such as spawners over a long distance? Box it up in a cardboard box for easy transport.
valhelsia.tip.tetra: Craft a hammer from the Tetra mod and use it on a spare Crafting Table to start modifying your tools.
valhelsia.tip.gavel: A Blacksmith Gavel gains an additional 30% chance to get extra items from breaking down ore. Stacks with Fortune!
valhelsia.tip.heat_generator: A Heat Generator surrounded by lava is a very cheap passive energy source. You can also lava-log the generator itself!
valhelsia.tip.minecolonies_start: If you're interested in starting MineColonies, search around for a large flat biome such as Plains for an easier time building.
valhelsia.tip.bears: You can tame bears if you have both honey and salmon. They make for a sturdy mount that can even fight for you!
valhelsia.tip.animal_dictionary: Take a look at the Animal Dictionary to learn more about much of the wildlife in the game.
valhelsia.tip.eternal_stella: You can make your gear indestructible by using Eternal Stella on it.
valhelsia.tip.flower_forest: If you find yourself in a Flower Forest, consider picking up Yellow Orchids and Aurum Saplings, both unique to the biome.
valhelsia.tip.xp_bottling: Want to store experience levels easily? Right-click on an Enchanting Table with a Glass Bottle!
valhelsia.tip.black_hole: A Black Hole can convert experience orbs into item form - great for a mob farm.
valhelsia.tip.tea: Fancy a cup of tea? Try searching for a Swamp biome for the seeds.
valhelsia.tip.coffee: Looking for a caffeine hit? Coffee beans grow naturally in Basalt Deltas in the Nether, and only grow on Basalt.
valhelsia.tip.shrines: Search out elemental shrines in the world for useful boons that last until you die.
valhelsia.tip.chisel: A chisel can make interesting new variants of most vanilla Minecraft blocks.
valhelsia.tip.effortless_building: Build faster with Effortless Building! Hold Left-Alt (default keybind) to select a mode.
valhelsia.tip.locked_drawers: Holding a Drawer Key in your offhand while placing Storage Drawers will automatically lock them.
valhelsia.tip.strawberry_altitude: Strawberries may grow differently at high enough altitudes, right near the top of the world.
valhelsia.tip.chairs: Sitting in a chair? A comparator can detect that! Too lazy to stand up? Send a redstone signal to the chair!
valhelsia.tip.crocodiles: If a crocodile comes for you, blocking an attack with your shield will stun it for a few seconds!
valhelsia.tip.platypus: Need some clay? Try handing some redstone to a platypus.
valhelsia.tip.terrapin: Jumping on a Terrapin twice in a row will unleash your inner Italian plumber.
valhelsia.tip.banana_slug: Banana Slug Slime is useful for building underwater.
valhelsia.tip.seal_bartering: Did you know you can barter with seals? They can even give you sponges!
valhelsia.tip.raccoons: While raccoons might steal food from your chests, they'll also steal items from villagers.
valhelsia.tip.blue_jay: If you feed a Blue Jay some Glow Berries, then some to a Raccoon, the two will pair up together!
valhelsia.tip.flute: A Flute will summon your pets directly to you.
valhelsia.tip.compass_sign_post: Using a Compass on a Sign Post will cause the Sign Post to face the direction the Compass is pointing in.
valhelsia.tip.quantum_catcher: A Quantum Catcher can capture most mobs inside, making them easy to transport.
valhelsia.tip.ender_pearl_dispenser: Have you ever wondered what would happen if a Dispenser fires an Ender Pearl? Try it!
